verses.text: \w Finally|strong="G3063"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* may \w have|strong="G5143"\w* \add free\add* \w course|strong="G5143"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \add it is\add* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may be \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w unreasonable|strong="G0824"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wicked|strong="G4190"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* have \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w stablish|strong="G4741"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* \add you\add* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* we have \w confidence|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w touching|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w ye|strong="G4160"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will \w do|strong="G4160"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we \w command|strong="G3853"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w direct|strong="G2720"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the patient \w waiting|strong="G5281"\w* for \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* we \w command|strong="G3853"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G4724"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* withdraw \w yourselves|strong="G4724"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* that \w walketh|strong="G4043"\w* \w disorderly|strong="G0814"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w tradition|strong="G3862"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* ye \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w follow|strong="G3401"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* we \w behaved|strong="G0812"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* ourselves \w disorderly|strong="G0812"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*;

\w Neither|strong="G3761"\w* did we \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* any \w manâ€™s|strong="G5100"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w* for \w nought|strong="G1432"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w wrought|strong="G2038"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w labour|strong="G2873"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w travail|strong="G3449"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w that|strong="G4314"\w* we \w might|strong="G1912"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be chargeable \w to|strong="G1912"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*:

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w make|strong="G1325"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* an \w ensample|strong="G5179"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w follow|strong="G3401"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* we \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w this|strong="G5124"\w* we \w commanded|strong="G3853"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w work|strong="G2038"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* should he \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* that there \w are|strong="G4043"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* which \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w disorderly|strong="G0814"\w*, \w working|strong="G2038"\w* not at \w all|strong="G3367"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* are \w busybodies|strong="G4020"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* them that are \w such|strong="G5108"\w* we \w command|strong="G3853"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w quietness|strong="G2271"\w* they \w work|strong="G2038"\w*, and \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* their \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w be|strong="G1573"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w weary|strong="G1573"\w* in well \w doing|strong="G2569"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* this \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w*, \w note|strong="G4593"\w* that \w man|strong="G5126"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G4874"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* company \w with|strong="G4874"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may be \w ashamed|strong="G1788"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w count|strong="G2233"\w* \add him\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* an \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w admonish|strong="G3560"\w* \add him\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* of \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w always|strong="G1223"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w means|strong="G5158"\w*. The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

The \w salutation|strong="G0783"\w* of \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* with mine \w own|strong="G1699"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w token|strong="G4592"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w*: \w so|strong="G3779"\w* I \w write|strong="G1125"\w*.

The \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. The second \add epistle\add* to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
